name: Ungbede Samuel
title: Mobile Developer
houseAddress: No 3, Zaria Close Agbara Estate, Ogun State
aboutMe:
I am a heartfelt mobile developer who loves learning and experimenting with new technologies as they evolve. I am always determined to make a novel contribution as an individual plus I love the sweet feeling of working with a team. Currently, I develop scalable Android applications with Kotlin. Some of my skills are Firebase Database, XML, Git workflow, Python for Data wrangling, Java, JavaScript, and TypeScript for front-end. As an active learner and problem solver, I’m currently working on my react-native skills in order to support and provide solutions for businesses that rely on cross-platform mobile applications to meet the demands of their customers.

Fun Fact About me

byDefaultIChatInCamelCase

pastProjects.title: Octamile Partners Application
pastProjects.description: An Application that can be used to purchase Motor vehicle Third Party, Comprehensive Insurance, Check Car history, and Also purchase VIN/Chassis report, also with the set reminder feature, dealers can be reminded of when their Comprehensive and Third Party Insurance will expire so that they can renew the policy.

pastProjects.title: Self-Service Kiosk
pastProjects.description: The Self-service Kiosk project was written in Flutter and meant for customers to carry out transactions such as bills payment, airtime purchases, and account updates like email and phone number updates.

pastProjects.title: Visitors Management System
pastProjects.description: The Visitors Management System(VMS) is an application designed for staff to schedule appointments for their visitors and generates invites in form of codes or QR-code, these codes will be tendered at the reception that automatically validates and checks the visitors in or out, and in real-time, the system records vital information such as time stamps, sends a message to the security department in the event of incidents, etc.

pastProjects.title: Hotel Voyage
pastProjects.description: An application that upon successful user registration, they can book and hotel of their choice, add a hotel to their wish list, and search for a hotel within their geographical location.

pastProjects.title: Location Tracker
pastProjects.description:
An android Application that requests permission to  track the location of a user and displays their real-time location on a map
Technologies Used - Kotlin, Android Studio, Google Map API, minimum SDK 19, Firebase.

pastProjects.title: Book Submission Application
pastProjects.description:
A multiplatform Application for Authors to submit their completed Book to publishers for review.
Technologies Used -Flutter, Dart, Firebase cloud Firestore, Firebase cloud function, Firebase Authentication, Gmail SMTP server.

pastProjects.title: Makeup Products Application
pastProjects.description:
A Nativa Android Application that fetches makeup products from the http://makeup-api.herokuapp.com/api/v1/products.json and this items are sorted based on brands, and product type

Technologies Used -Coroutines, Android studio, Gradle, Flow Kotlin ,Git/GitHub, GitHub Actions, Glider, Jetpack Library, Retrofit, Jetpack–Lifecycle, ViewModel, ViewBinding, NavigationComponent, Dagger Hilt for dependency injection.
